attributes.action: Lower the open car/van insurance policy age from 25 to 21
attributes.additional_details: If the open insurance policy is lowered from 25 to 21 this will help young adults to get jobs as delivery drivers. It will reduce unemployment and save alot of tax payers money. Young adults would be able to make a living. It will reduce the burden off the tax payers and it will give more job opportunities to young adults
attributes.background: I want the government to lower the age of open insurance from 25 to 21 as this will help alot of people to work as a delivery driver and I think I think over 21s are capable of driving and have experience.

rejection.details: Decisions about the types of policy offered to different age groups is a matter for individual insurance providers, not the Government or House of Commons.
